parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the EDAS application.

parameters.name: ListenerPort
parameters.description: The listener port for the SLB instance.

parameters.name: SlbId
parameters.description: The ID of the SLB instance.

parameters.name: SlbIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the SLB instance.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the SLB instance. Valid values:

*   internet: Internet-facing SLB instance
*   intranet: internal-facing SLB instance

parameters.name: VServerGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the vServer group for the internal-facing SLB instance.
